attributes.action: Get the euro 2020 final moved to Saturday 10/07/21
attributes.additional_details: Because on a Sunday evening who can party
attributes.background: If England reach the final of euro 2020 move the final from Sunday 11/07/21 to Saturday 10/07/21

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about the scheduling of sporting events are a matter for the organisers, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
